quotes.quote: Celebrate life in all its glory - challenge yourself to let the routine sing, and the new dance.
As long as habit and routine dictate the pattern of living, new dimensions of the soul will not emerge.
One travels to run away from routine, that dreadful routine that kills all imagination and all our capacity for enthusiasm.
The less routine the more life.
If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine; it is lethal.
Habit and routine have an unbelievable power to waste and destroy.
A man practices the art of adventure when he breaks the chain of routine.
Your future is found in your daily routine. Successful people do daily what others do occasionally!
The big things that come our way are the fruit of seeds planted in the daily routine of our work.
There is a distinction between a relationship which has a routine and a relationship which becomes routine
Don't mistake routine for commitment, just showing up is not enough.
The final result of too much routine is death in life.
Running through things because you are familiar with them, breeds routine and this is the seed of boredom.
Men fall into a routine when they are tired and slack: it has all the appearance of activity with few of its burdens.
With every adversity comes a blessing because a shock acts as a reminder to oneself that we must not get stale in routine.
Great cultural changes begin in affectation and end in routine.
Routine is not organization, any more than paralysis is order.
Habit is the beneficent harness of routine which enables silly men to live respectfully and unhappy men to live calmly
All of us, from time to time, need a plunge into freedom and novelty, after which routine and discipline will seem delightful by contrast
Men of routine or men who can do what they are told are not hard to find; but men who can think and plan and tell the routine men what to do are very rare.
So much of our time is spent in preparation, so much in routine, and so much in retrospect, that the amount of each person's genius is confined to a very few hours.
Routine is a ground to stand on, a wall to retreat to; we cannot draw on our boots without bracing ourselves against it.
Long term success is a direct result of what you achieve everyday. Goals provide your daily routine
A child reminds us that playtime is an essential part of our daily routine.
It is the leisured, I have noticed, who rebel the most at an interruption of routine.
Out of routine comes inspiration. That's the idea, anyway. To grasp what's exceptional, you first have to know what's routine.
How easily the routine of sin establishes itself.
Most people are so constituted that they can only be virtuous in a certain routine; an irregular course of life demoralizes them.
Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
Yesterday's adaptations are today's routines.
